name: Karim Uddin
details: Karim has over 10 years of experience managing sports equipment stores. He ensures smooth operations and excellent customer service at Los Blancos.

name: Sajid Rahman
details: Sajid is passionate about sports and has extensive knowledge of various sports equipment. He helps customers find the perfect gear to meet their needs.

name: Rafiq Hossain
details: Rafiq specializes in football and cricket equipment. His expertise ensures that Los Blancos offers the best products available on the market.

name: Naimur Islam
details: Naimur handles all marketing activities, including promotions and advertising campaigns, to increase brand awareness and drive sales at Los Blancos.

name: Arif Ahmed
details: Arif provides exceptional customer support, assisting with inquiries, returns, and ensuring customer satisfaction with their purchases.
